original_text: At this retort Moses fled and became an exile in the land of Midian, where he became the father of two sons.
korean_text: 모세가 이 말 때문에 도주하여 미디안 땅에서 나그네 되어 거기서 아들 둘을 낳으니라

sentences.original_text: and became an exile in the land of Midian
where he became the father of two sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그는 두 아들의 아버지가 되었다
